fastDFE
  • Welcome to fastDFE’s documentation
  • View page source

Welcome to fastDFE’s documentation

fastDFE is a package for fast, flexible, and hierarchical inference of the distribution of fitness effects (DFE) from site frequency spectra (SFS).

  • Introduction
    • Motivation
    • How it works
    • Features
